content:
See block vote open today that affects MHD - Vote in StructDoc as they own DocumentReference and DocumentManifest.
Balloters
Brett Marquard
Eric Haas
John Moehrke
Joshua Mandel
Nayan Mergu
Sean McIlvenna
Line Items
14822 Make+DocumentReference.type+and+class+1..1+-+2018-Jan+Core+%23162 (Nayan Mergu) Not Persuasive
17450 DocumentReference.description+should+be+.title+to+align+better+with+Composition (John Moehrke) Not Persuasive with Mod
15658 add+EpisodeOfCare+reference+to+DR.context.encounter (Eric Haas) Persuasive
17155 On+DocumentReference%3A+search+parameter+%22securitylabel%22+should+be+renamed+to+%22security-label%22%2C (Joshua Mandel) Persuasive
17452 DocumentReference.context.related+need+only+be+Reference (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17453 DocumentReference.created+should+be+removed+as+redundant+to+DocumentReference.content.attachment.created (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17454 DocumentReference+should+have+a+mapping+to+CDA+header+when+referenced+document+is+CDA (John Moehrke) Persuasive
13917 Improve+Definitions+for+DocumentReference+Class+and+Type (Brett Marquard) Persuasive with Mod
15815 Create+mapping+between+Composition+and+DocumentReference (Sean McIlvenna) Persuasive with Mod
13969 DocumentManifest.type+is+not+properly+described (John Moehrke) Not Related
17297 DocumentManifest.type+is+not+properly+described (John Moehrke) Persuasive
Note, I don't see a problem with this block. IHE and MHD can adjust in the next version that aligns with R4
note as well that SD approved GF#17171 which will rename .class to category to align with pattern common in FHIR, and set cardinality to 0..*
